title: Just got attempting to reconnect in game... now trying to get back in to game... server isnt working
body:
This is not on my end as i never D/C and all my internet is working

Edit : got back into game 5 mins later

Edit : just lost game cuz of this and no lossprevented

feels very sadman

replies.body: There doesn't seem to be any issues with the server at the moment.  Are you still experiencing any connection issues?  Your network may have had a hiccup, and I recommend trying some custom games to be sure.  You can also run this [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for the match you disconnected from for an overview of what went wrong.  Let me know, I'd be happy to troubleshoot.
